means: 使分离( dissociate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The editor dissociated herself from the views in the article.
sentence.Network_cn: 编者声明那篇文章的观点不代表她的观点.

sentence.Network_en: The positive and negative ions become separated or dissociated.
sentence.Network_cn: 正负离子彼此分开或解离.

PerfectNetExp.abs: dissociated 分离的dissociated 分离的游离的dissociation constant 分解常数
Now see that dissociated positive image again ., 现在看见那个抽离的积极图像.
Methods Using dissociated cell culture of rat embryo in vitro ., 方法采用大鼠胚胎中脑神经元细胞进行体外培养.
dissociated 分解, dissociated 游离的, dissociated 微生物

list.abs: dissociation constant 离解常数dissociation energy 离解能dissociation pressure 离解压
电离常数亦称电离平衡常数,是弱电解质溶液中电离平衡的常数,用Ki表示。电解常数是电解质...强电离没有固定的电离常数,电离常数亦称离解常数(Dissociation Constant).
(2)分离性神游症(dissociative fugue)：是解离性障碍的一种特殊形式患者常在急剧的精神刺激作用下发病突然从某一地方向另一地区游 …
...（Dissociative Amnesia） • 解离性漫游症（Dissociative Fugue） • 解离性身分疾患（Dissociative Identity Disorder） • 自我感消失.
1.解离性失忆症（Dissociative amnesia）：发作通常很突然。患者会无法回忆先前的生活、抑或人格。

entry.tran: (通常指为了避免麻烦和责难而)与…断绝关系，表明与…没有关系
entry.def: If you dissociate yourself from something or someone, you say or show that you are not connected with them, usually in order to avoid trouble or blame.

example.ex: It is getting harder for the president to dissociate himself from the scandal.
example.tran: 总统越来越难摆脱这一丑闻了。

entry.def: If you dissociate one thing from another, you consider the two things as separate from each other, or you separate them.

example.ex: Almost the first lesson they learn is how to dissociate emotion from reason.
example.tran: 如何将理智和情感分开几乎可以说是他们所上的第一课。

auth_sentence.content: The college has informed the police and dissociated itself from any alleged wrongdoing.
auth_sentence.res_content: The college has informed the police and dissociated itself from any alleged wrongdoing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The college has informed the police and dissociated itself from any alleged wrongdoing.

auth_sentence.content: The whole subject of child-birth was completely dissociated in my mind from that of sex.
auth_sentence.res_content: The whole subject of child-birth was completely dissociated in my mind from that of sex.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The whole subject of child-birth was completely dissociated in my mind from that of sex.

auth_sentence.content: Some of those chosen to be on the council expressed surprise and dissociated themselves from it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some of those chosen to be on the council expressed surprise and dissociated themselves from it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some of those chosen to be on the council expressed surprise and dissociated themselves from it.
